translations: n.轻骑兵（以制服华丽著称）
n.（Hussar）人名；（英）赫萨；（捷、罗）胡萨尔

phrs.translation: 骠骑兵, 轻骑兵, 音箱, 骑兵
翼骑兵, 特殊单位波兰翼骑兵

sentences.sentence: Rostov lifted his head, which had dropped on to his horses mane, and pulled up beside the hussar.
sentences.translation: 罗斯托夫抬起他那低垂在马鬃上的头，在骠骑兵身边停步了。

sentences.sentence: The Hanoverian general Freytag was taken prisoner by a French hussar, who, perceiving that he had a valuable watch, said, "Give me your watch."
sentences.translation: 汉诺威将领弗赖·塔格被法国一个轻骑兵所擒。那轻骑兵见他有个名贵的表，就说：“把表给我。”
